content:
Generate a personalized nickname based on George's favorite animal, favorite color, and birth month. Use this table to determine the animal and color based on the birth month: 
| Month | Animal | Color |
|-------|--------|-------|
| Jan   | Panda  | Blue  |
| Feb   | Lion   | Green |
| Mar   | Giraffe| Pink  |
| Apr   | Elephant| Orange |
| May   | Monkey | Purple|
| Jun   | Tiger  | Yellow|
| Jul   | Koala  | Red   |
| Aug   | Penguin| Black |
| Sep   | Dolphin| Brown |
| Oct   | Zebra  | Gray  |
| Nov   | Bear   | White |
| Dec   | Hippo  | Gold  |

To create a personalized nickname for George, we need to know his birth month. Once we have that, we can determine his favorite animal and color based on the table provided. Please let me know George's birth month so we can proceed!
